content: of a coordinating sparkly yarn choose colors with enough contrast to let the texture stand out while allowing the sparkle to blend in naturally when changing colors it is easier to carry the yarn up the sides rather than cutting it each time if you prefer this helps keep the number of ends to a minimum and makes finishing much quicker the top and bottom borders are knit in garter stitch knit every row the rest of the blanket is stockinette stitch knit the front purl the back keeping garter stitch outside borders except for the lace row as described in the pattern instructions odd row are right side rs row and even row are wrong side ws row pattern by candyloucreations | candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations twinkle toes baby blanket knitting pattern instructions section 1 main color garter border with worsted weight yarn and size us 8 needles and mc for stroller baby small medium large cast on 100 128 172 216 272 knit 12 row on the last row as you knit it place a stitch marker after the first 8 stitches and before the last 8 stitches section 2 main color block stockinette continuing with mc row 1 rs knit row 2 ws k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 repeat row 1 and 2 five more times for a total of 12 row in stockinette keeping a garter stitch border knit the first 8 stitches and last 8 stitches of every row at the end of this section you will have 12 row of mc stockinette section 3 stripe sparkle eyelets cut mc and pick up cc row 1 knit row 2 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 repeat row 1 and 2 two more times for a total of 6 row keeping a garter stitch border knit the first 8 stitches and last 8 stitches of every row pattern by candyloucreations | candylou com | instagram @candyloucreations twinkle toes baby blanket knitting pattern drop cc and pick up sparkly yarn row 7 knit row 8 k8 yo k2tog * repeat * down the row to the last 8 stitches k8 cut sparkly yarn and pick up cc row 9 knit row 10 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 repeat row 9 and 10 two more times for a total of 6 more row at the end of this section there will be a total of 14 row 6 stockinette row 2 eyelet row and 6 more stockinette row section 4 main color block cut cc and pick up mc row 1 rs knit row 2 ws k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 repeat row 1 and 2 five more times for a total of 12 row in stockinette keeping a garter stitch border knit the first 8 stitches and last 8 stitches of every row section 5 thinner stripe sparkles cut mc and pick up cc row 1 knit row 2 k8 purl to last 8 stitches k8 drop cc and
